name: form_structure
description: Will contain the structure for a form to be completed in order to create a plan on the user subject

title.description: The title of the plan being created.

success.description: If the request can be completed. If the request has nothing to do with something to be planned, this should be false

inputs.description: List of input components used in the plan.

inputType.description: The type of input. Checkbox for yes no questions, Text for short answers, textarea for lists or descriptions and date for dates

question.description: The question to be made in that component

mandatory.description: If the input must be answered in order to finish the plan

id.description: A unique identifier that should be this object's inputType a number
